import pytest
from pyspark.sql.types import StructField, StructType, StringType
import unittest

class TestHelperSchemaTransformUnit(SparkSessionBaseClass):

    def setUp(self):
        super().setUp()

    def test_add_index_column(self):
        data = [("Apple", "Fruit"),
                ("Orange", "Fruit"),
                ("Banana", "Fruit")]
        schema = StructType([
            StructField("Name", StringType(), True),
            StructField("Type", StringType(), True)
        ])
        df = self.spark_session.createDataFrame(data, schema)

        # Instantiate class
        transformer = SchemaTransformer()
        result_df = transformer.add_index_column(df, 0, 'Index')

        # ASSERTS
        assert result_df.count() == len(data), f"Expected row count to be {len(data)}, result was {result_df.count()}."
        assert len(result_df.columns) == 3, f"Expected columns to be {len(df.columns) + 1}, result was {len(result_df.columns)}."
        assert 'Index' in result_df.columns, f"Expected Index column to be added, result was none."

        # add assert values for first row
        first_row_result_df = result_df.filter((result_df["Name"] == "Apple")).collect()[0] # ["Apple", "Fruit", "0"]
        assert first_row_result_df.Name == "Apple", f"Expected col Name to be Apple, result was {first_row_result_df.Name}."
        assert first_row_result_df.Type == "Fruit", f"Expected col Type to be Fruit, result was {first_row_result_df.Type}."
        assert first_row_result_df.Index == 0, f"Expected col Index to be 0, result was {first_row_result_df.Index}."
        # add assert values for last row
        first_row_result_df = result_df.filter((result_df["Name"] == "Banana")).collect()[0] # ["Banana", "Fruit", "2"]
        assert first_row_result_df.Name == "Banana", f"Expected col Name to be Banana, result was {first_row_result_df.Name}."
        assert first_row_result_df.Type == "Fruit", f"Expected col Type to be Fruit, result was {first_row_result_df.Type}."
        assert first_row_result_df.Index == 2, f"Expected col Index to be 2, result was {first_row_result_df.Index}."
